title: Kookie UI Button Components
description: Complete JSON Schema collection for all button components in Kookie UI

as.description: HTML element type to render as

asChild.description: Merge props with child element instead of rendering wrapper

size.description: Button size for responsive design and interface density

variant.description: Visual variant that determines the button's appearance and context

highContrast.description: High contrast mode for better accessibility

loading.description: Loading state that shows a spinner and disables interaction

fullWidth.description: Full width mode that expands the button to fill its container

material.description: Material type for visual rendering and depth effects

panelBackground.description: Panel background type (deprecated - use material instead)

flush.description: Flush mode that removes visual padding for seamless text integration

base-button.title: Base-button Component Props
base-button.description: Props schema for the base-button component in Kookie UI

as.description: HTML element type to render as

asChild.description: Merge props with child element instead of rendering wrapper

size.description: Button size for responsive design and interface density

variant.description: Visual variant that determines the button's appearance and context

highContrast.description: High contrast mode for better accessibility

loading.description: Loading state that shows a spinner and disables interaction

fullWidth.description: Full width mode that expands the button to fill its container

material.description: Material type for visual rendering and depth effects

panelBackground.description: Panel background type (deprecated - use material instead)

flush.description: Flush mode that removes visual padding for seamless text integration

tooltip.description: Content to display in the tooltip on hover/focus

tooltipSide.description: Side of the button where the tooltip should appear

tooltipAlign.description: Alignment of the tooltip relative to the button

tooltipDelayDuration.description: Delay before showing the tooltip (in milliseconds)

tooltipDisableHoverableContent.description: Whether to disable hoverable content behavior

overrideStyles.description: Override styles for different interaction states

button.title: Button Component Props
button.description: Props schema for the button component in Kookie UI

variant.description: Visual variant that determines the button's appearance and context

material.description: Material type for visual rendering and depth effects

panelBackground.description: Panel background type (deprecated - use material instead)

flush.description: Flush mode that removes visual padding for seamless text integration

children.description: Children elements (required for accessibility if no aria-label)

tooltipSide.description: Side of the button where the tooltip should appear

tooltipAlign.description: Alignment of the tooltip relative to the button

tooltipDelayDuration.description: Delay before showing the tooltip (in milliseconds)

tooltipDisableHoverableContent.description: Whether to disable hoverable content behavior
